nodes.text: "Escaping Naboo" is a canon short story that appears in The Prequel Trilogy Stories. It was written by Rebecca L. Schmidt. It adapts the events of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace from Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi's landing on Naboo to their escape from the Trade Federation with Padmé Amidala.
